Row.Text: Missionaries come to the Religious Guild to worship the gods.

Missionaries come to the Religious Guild to worship the gods. The Religious Guild yields +3 Faith per turn and +1 Great Prophet point per turn. You will need to build a Shrine before you can build the Religious Guild.
Young children come to school to learn.
Young children come to school to learn. The school yields +3 Science per turn and +1 Great Scientist point per turn. You will need to build a Library before you can build the School.
The Nuclear Power Plant is an upgraded Power Plant.

The Nuclear Power Plant is an upgraded Power Plant, where it takes a lot to build but in return the buildings yields loads. The Nuclear Power Plant yields +5 Production per turn and +1 Great Engineer point per turn. You will need to build a Power Plant or Electronics Factory before you can build the Nuclear Power Plant.
The Black Market is the same as the regular market, however they sell items that are illegal.

The Black Market is the same as the regular market, however they sell items that are illegal. The Black Market yields +4 Gold per turn and +1 Great Merchant point per turn. You will need to build a Market before you can build the Black Market.
